system.description:
This spell creates a multi-layered magical barrier composed of seven colors, each with unique properties and defenses.

Properties:

  • The wall is 2 inches thick, with 1/8-inch gaps between colors.

  • The effect must be either:

    • A 10' radius sphere centered on the caster.
    • A 500 square foot flat surface (vertical or horizontal).
  • The wall is immovable (even by a wish).
  • The caster may pass through freely with any chosen items.
  • Other creatures or objects making contact suffer effects from each layer they pass through.
  • Extends into the Ethereal Plane, preventing planar travel through it.

Bypassing the Wall:

  • A wish spell or rod of cancellation removes only the three outermost layers.
  • Each layer must be removed in order with the appropriate spell.

Prismatic Wall Layers & Effects:

Color

Effect

Spell to Remove

Red

Blocks all magical missiles; inflicts [[/r 12 #Fire Damage]].

Any magical cold

Orange

Blocks all non-magical missiles; inflicts [[/r 24 #Lightning Damage]].

Any magical lightning

Yellow

Blocks all breath weapons; inflicts [[/r 48 #Acid Damage]].

Magic missile spell

Green

Blocks all detection spells; save vs. poison or die if touched.

Passwall spell

Blue

Blocks all poisons, gases, and gaze attacks; save vs. petrification or be turned to stone.

Disintegrate spell

Indigo

Blocks all matter; save vs. spells or be gated to a random outer plane (50% chance of being lost forever).

Dispel magic spell

Violet

Blocks all magic; save vs. wands or be struck unconscious and insane (curable only by Cureall or a Wish).

Continual light spell

Special Interactions:

  • Anti-Magic Shell: Prevents passage but does not dispel the wall.
  • Planar Travel: The wall extends into adjacent planes, preventing teleportation through it.
  • Physical Attacks: The wall is indestructible.
